{{ product.name }}

Price: {{ product.price }}

import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import { HttpClient } from "@angular/common/http"; import { Observable } from "rxjs"; import { DataService } from "./services/data.service"; import * as data from ".src/assets/data/products-data"; @Component({ selector: "app-root", templateUrl: "./app.component.html", styleUrls: ["./app.component.scss"], }) export class AppComponent { allProducts = []; filteredProducts = []; constructor(private dataService: DataService) {} ngOnInit() { this.allProducts = this.dataService.products; this.filteredProducts = this.allProducts; } }
